Package edu.cmu.iot

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    IoTConnection
    A connection to an IoT-enabled house.
    IoTConnectManager
    Manages connection to the IoT house Project: LG Exec Ed Program Copyright: Copyright (c) 2015 Jeffrey S.
    IoTControllerDriver
    Driver for the IoT house control panel Project: LG Exec Ed Program Copyright: Copyright (c) 2015 Jeffrey S.
    IoTControlManager
    Controls the state of the IoT house.
    IoTControlWindow
    The main window for the IoT house Project: LG Exec Ed Program Copyright: Copyright (c) 2015 Jeffrey S.
    IoTValues
    Constant values used in the house Project: LG Exec Ed Program Copyright: Copyright (c) 2015 Jeffrey S.
    LoginHandler
    Validate username and password Project: LG Exec Ed Program Copyright: Copyright (c) 2015 Jeffrey S.
    LoginWindow
    Dialog to accept user credentials Project: LG Exec Ed Program Copyright: Copyright (c) 2015 Jeffrey S.
    NewUserDialog
    A Dialog to add a new user to the system Project: LG Exec Ed Program Copyright: Copyright (c) 2015 Jeffrey S.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    LoginAttemptsExceededException
    Class to represent the number of login attempts have been exceeded.
